_header: In domus dei if thou will speed
_description: The Seven Works of Mercy Bodily — three couplets

BLRoy8Fvii.Transcription:
In domus dey ȝyf þu wylspedeÞe naked þu clothe
                    þe hungur fedeDrynke gyfe to þe thyrs thrysty ȝyf þu
                    mayÞe pore pylgryme herborow I sayVyste þe seke I prisound
                    salaceByry þe dede ȝyf þu wyle haue grace
